backend/main.mo: Defines core cemetery data types, public result shapes, and comparison helpers for graves and deceased persons.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for many frontend source files used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining light/dark CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app handling authentication, theme, routing between public/admin views, and profile setup logic.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when a non‑authorized user logs in, offering logout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGrave: Shows an interactive cemetery map with grave status coloring and opens an edit dialog when a grave is selected.
frontend/src/components/admin/CemeteryLa: Provides UI to add and remove alleys and graves within the cemetery layout, including confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveEditD: Modal dialog for creating or editing grave records, including status, deceased persons, owner, and payment data.
frontend/src/components/admin/GraveManag: Displays searchable, paginated grave records and allows creating new graves via a lazily loaded edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/imageEditi: Utility functions for loading, converting, and resizing images, returning processed data as Uint8Array.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: Handles image uploading, previewing, resizing, and saving with progress tracking and optional removal.
Generates a styled cemetery registry PDF using grave and cemetery data with HTML templates and triggers file download.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin UI for editing site content sections, handling text updates and image uploads via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Displays backend connectivity status with warnings after timeout.
frontend/src/components/FloatingLoginCon: Floating login button for unauthenticated users with Internet Identity handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays contact info, banking details, and website link using fetched footer content with fallbacks and error banner.
frontend/src/components/GraveResultsList: Renders paginated grave search results for public and admin views with status badges and optional editing.
frontend/src/components/GraveSearch.tsx: Provides admin and public grave search with debounced filtering, paginated loading, and full‑text search indices.
frontend/src/components/GraveTileMap.tsx: Shows an interactive cemetery map with alleys and grave tiles, using tile data and status-based coloring.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays site header with logo, parish name, theme toggle, and optional logout for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Shows homepage hero image, headline, and intro text with loading skeletons and fallback content.
frontend/src/components/LazyMount.tsx: Utility that mounts children only when near viewport to optimize heavy content rendering.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving user profile data with validation and feedback messages.
frontend/src/components/PublicSectionsTi: Renders a grid of selectable public section tiles with icons and labels, triggering onSelect when clicked.
frontend/src/components/SiteContentLoadE: Displays an alert banner showing a customizable site‑content loading error message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, providing identity, login/clear actions, and status tracking through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Tracks whether an element is in the viewport using IntersectionObserver, with optional one-time trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for backend operations with caching, retry logic, and error handling for graves, content, and user data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface with tabbed navigation loading various management components lazily.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPage.tsx: Public page with hero section, tile navigation, lazy-loaded search/map tabs, and optional prayer/about sections.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Utilities for detecting specific authorization errors such as Boss-lock and general unauthorized states.
frontend/src/utils/graveFullTextSearch.t: Provides text normalization and in-memory full‑text search utilities for graves in admin and public modes.
frontend/src/utils/graveStatusStyles.ts: Maps grave statuses to consistent CSS classes and labels for UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content scanning, extended color tokens, layout settings, and custom keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for a grave management app, listing features, issues, and pending requests related to enhancing search result details.
